feed.title: Wishlist Releases

entry.title: New release for Wishlist: v0.42.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove logger mixin causing error by @cmintey in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/275
  • Update Vite PWA by @cmintey in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/273

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/compare/v0.42.0...v0.42.1

entry.title: New release for Wishlist: v0.42.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

entry.title: New release for Wishlist: v0.42.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix logic for fetching available lists to use on item form by @cmintey in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/285
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/286
